title: Can I eat veg food that is cooked in restaurants that serve pork mixing utensils
transcript: from canada says can i eat none uh can i eat vegetarian food that is being cooked in the same stoves or in the using the same utensils in restaurants that uh serve pork and haram meat the answer is no if the utensils are the same you cannot eat there but if it's only the stove or the oven there's no problem in that
